articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says the future of under-pressure manager Erik ten Hag is "not my call".

articles.description: Fourth seed Coco Gauff comes from a set and a break down to beat Paula Badosa and reach her first China Open final.

articles.description: Pep Guardiola wants Manchester City's first matches of next season to be postponed but fears the Premier League are not interested in helping ease the burden on their players.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola wants 2025-26 fixtures delayed after Club World Cup

articles.description: Paul Pogba's four-year ban for a doping offence has been reduced to 18 months after winning his appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport (Cas).

articles.description: Leeds United head coach Daniel Farke admits he has never experienced a moment like Illan Meslier's mistake against Sunderland.
articles.title: Illan Meslier: Leeds goalkeeper 'in tears' after Sunderland error

articles.description: As Shohei Ohtani prepares for his MLB play-off debut, BBC Sport looks at how he has become one of the world's highest-paid athletes.
